header.name: Piyush Kakkar
header.title: Software Developer
header.summary: A passionate and self-motivated software developer with high level of experience working on multiple projects. Versatile Full Stack Web Developer with more than 1+ year of professional experience developing consumer focused websites. Talented in project management, team leadership and independent problem-solving. Highly organized multitasking with expertise in scheduling projects, enhancing designs and verifying code. Looking to join organization where opportunity for growth and professional development is embraced.

subSections.content: The system provides a complete solution for a static image or video surveillance based face detection and recognition of criminals with higher accuracy and better response rate. Technologies: Python, OpenCV, Haar Cascade, MySQL, Tkinter

A web based Chat Application that provides features like One to One chat, Broadcast message to multiple people, Media sharing, Smart status etc. Technologies: AngularJS, NodeJS, Bootstrap, MySQL, Socket.IO, JavaScript, JQuery
A task scheduling web application. The application can be used to schedule tasks with smart filters and reminders. Technologies: HTML, CSS, JQuery, NodeJS, and MySQL
A basic chatbot for Facebook Messenger that gives Wikipedia results based on queries. Technologies: JavaScript and NodeJS
